page.title: 14SPORT IN WALKDEN
page.content: SPORT IN WALKDEN St.Andrew's Cricket ground was built in 1926.It consists of a cricket ground, two tennis courts and a bowling green.The club has two cricket teams, a first team and a second team.They play in the bottom league.The ground has recently had a modern pavillion hut built, which cost Â£3400 and it makes the ground look a lot tidier.The tennis club have three teams A,B,C level.It is any age to join.They have a very good record in tennis competition.They also play in the Bolton league.In Walkden we have pub teams such as The Bell, The Albion, The New Inn, The Spa and The Shamrock,these play in the Salford Sunday League.The under fifteen teams include Kenyon Way and The Lancastrian in the Salford Sunday League. BY MARK WHITTON AND CRAIG ROBINSON
